Gealyn P. 
3rd
IT and Tech Senior Recruiter @ Russell Tobin – Currently hiring for multiple tech roles in Malaysia, Australia, Singapore & Philippines!
Job poster
Message
About the job
Job Opportunity: Full Stack Software Developer
Location: Singapore, Singapore
Experience: 4+ years
Employment Type: Full-time, Morning Shift, Onsite

NOTE: Only Singaporean locals or PR holders can apply.

About the Role
You will be involved in the end-to-end software development lifecycle, including frontend and backend development, system integration, testing, deployment of the software testing toolkits. You will work closely with system engineers, testers, and operational users to ensure the toolkits meet operational, technical, and regulatory requirements.

Key Responsibilities
Develop full-stack testing toolkits and simulators for ATM support systems.
Build intuitive frontend interfaces and robust backend services/APIs for automated testing and data simulation.
Integrate with third-party APIs and services as needed.
Implement test automation frameworks and CI/CD pipelines.
Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize applications.
Work with system engineers and testers to define requirements and ensure full scenario coverage.
Maintain scalable, maintainable code aligned with best practices.
Prepare and update technical documentation.
Ensure compliance with aviation standards and cybersecurity requirements.
Support system integration, testing, and commissioning activities.
Stay updated on emerging technologies and suggest process improvements.

Requirements
At least 3 years of full-stack development experience, preferably in mission-critical or safety-critical systems.
Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript, and frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
Strong backend skills in Python, Java, Node.js, or similar languages.
Experience with RESTful APIs, microservices, and SQL/NoSQL databases.
Knowledge of system simulation, data modelling, and test data generation.
Familiar with version control, automated testing, CI/CD, code reviews, and agile workflows.
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) and containerisation (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus.
Strong analytical, problem-solving, communication, and documentation skills.
Organised, self-driven, and able to manage multiple tasks.
Willing to travel for integration or stakeholder engagements when required.

Does this sound like you or someone you know? Kindly send your CV here: gealyn.pafin@prideglobal.com

Looking forward to meeting you!
About the company
Pride Global
104,559 followers
Follow
Human Resources Services 1,001-5,000 employees 1,852 on LinkedIn
Pride Global is a minority-owned integrated human capital solutions & advisory firm headquartered in New York with operating companies throughout the United States, United Kingdom, Ireland, Netherlands, Canada, India, Brazil, Philippines, and Singapore.

The Pride Global network of companies focuses on a diverse array of human resources solutions including managed services, vendor management, payroll programs, business process optimization, and staffing for both direct hire and contingent labor.

Pride Global companies include the following: PrideOne, Russell Tobin, PrideBPO, PrideHealth, PrideNow, and Pride India.

Our team mission is to treat our stakeholders better than anyone in our industry by attracting, equipping and retaining the best individuals who will work as a team to achieve our corporate objectives.
